source:
#denmark_medicine_path = "abfss://group3fpfilesystem@group3fpadls.dfs.core.windows.net/standardized/denmark_medicine.parquet/"
#norway_medicine_path = "abfss://group3fpfilesystem@group3fpadls.dfs.core.windows.net/standardized/norway_medicine.parquet/"
sweden_medicine_path = "abfss://group3fpfilesystem@group3fpadls.dfs.core.windows.net/standardized/sweden_medicine.parquet/"
sweden_medicine_path_2 = "abfss://group3fpfilesystem@group3fpadls.dfs.core.windows.net/standardized/sweden_medicine_2.parquet/"

#df_denmark_medicine = spark.read.parquet(denmark_medicine_path)
#df_norway_medicine = spark.read.parquet(norway_medicine_path)
df_sweden_medicine = spark.read.parquet(sweden_medicine_path)
df_sweden_medicine_2 = spark.read.parquet(sweden_medicine_path_2)

#df_denmark_medicine.createOrReplaceTempView("denmark_medicine")
#df_norway_medicine.createOrReplaceTempView("norway_medicine")
df_sweden_medicine.createOrReplaceTempView("sweden_medicine")
df_sweden_medicine_2.createOrReplaceTempView("sweden_medicine_2")

%%sql

REFRESH TABLE sweden_medicine;

--- Sort based on values missing from the other sweden dataset
SELECT * FROM sweden_medicine WHERE atc_level_5 IN ("A10AC03", "A10AC30", "A10AD03", "A10AE02", "A10BG01");

-- Count rows for the full table
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_rows
FROM sweden_medicine WHERE sex = "Båda könen";

-- Count rows for the filtered ATC codes
SELECT COUNT(*) AS filtered_rows
FROM sweden_medicine
WHERE atc_level_5 IN (
    'A10BD05','A10BH03','A10BD08','A10AD04','A10BJ03','A10BD19','A10BD07','A10BF01',
    'A10BD11','A10BK04','A10AB06','A10BB01','A10BH02','A10BG03','A10BK03','A10BH01',
    'A10BB07','A10AB03','A10BD04','A10BJ06','A10BK02','A10AD05','A10AE01','A10AB04',
    'A10AE54','A10BK01','A10BH05','A10BX02','A10BD23','A10BJ01','A10AD01','A10BA02',
    'A10AB05','A10BB02','A10AE06','A10BD20','A10BD10','A10AE04','A10BJ02','A10BX03',
    'A10AC01','A10BJ05','A10BB12','A10BG02','A10BD15','A10BD03','A10AB01','A10BD24',
    'A10AE56','A10BD21','A10AE05'
) AND sex = "Båda könen";

SELECT *
FROM sweden_medicine
WHERE atc_level_5 NOT IN (
    'A10BD05','A10BH03','A10BD08','A10AD04','A10BJ03','A10BD19','A10BD07','A10BF01',
    'A10BD11','A10BK04','A10AB06','A10BB01','A10BH02','A10BG03','A10BK03','A10BH01',
    'A10BB07','A10AB03','A10BD04','A10BJ06','A10BK02','A10AD05','A10AE01','A10AB04',
    'A10AE54','A10BK01','A10BH05','A10BX02','A10BD23','A10BJ01','A10AD01','A10BA02',
    'A10AB05','A10BB02','A10AE06','A10BD20','A10BD10','A10AE04','A10BJ02','A10BX03',
    'A10AC01','A10BJ05','A10BB12','A10BG02','A10BD15','A10BD03','A10AB01','A10BD24',
    'A10AE56','A10BD21','A10AE05'
) AND sex = "Båda könen";

SELECT * FROM sweden_medicine_2 WHERE atc_level_5 = "A10BX16";
